name: Ride Bristol
description: Bristol's off-road cycling charity, organising community cycling events & developing trails. Rides are at a social, no drop pace, you'll need a mountain bike (or similar) and a helmet. Less experienced riders and newbies are 100% welcome!

location.address: Pedal Progression, Ashton Court Golf and Cycle Hub, Abbots Leigh Road, BS8 3PX

events.name: The Women's Ride
events.details: These rides are for all women / marginalised genders and are a social, no drop pace. You'll need a mountain bike (or similar) and a helmet and be happy riding the surfaced, blue trails at AC. Less experienced riders and newbies are 100% welcome!

location.address: Pedal Progression, Ashton Court Golf and Cycle Hub, Abbots Leigh Road, BS8 3PX
